alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kleberg; Inland Kleberg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nueces, central Jim Wells and western Kleberg Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 445 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ricardo, or 8 miles southeast of Kingsville, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kingsville, Driscoll, Bishop, Riviera Beach, Riviera, Ricardo, Kingsville Naval Air Station, Petronila and Loyola Beach. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 674 and 708. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
